ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.overlay
Class Overlay

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.overlay.Overlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DragAndDropOverlay, MyLocationOverlay
public class Overlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable

Overlay.java: The map layer object which controls overlay objects displayed on it.

This file is a part of the Yandex Map Kit.

Version for Android Â© 2012 YANDEX

You may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
You may obtain a copy of the License at http://legal.yandex.ru/mapkit/

Method Detail

getMapController

public MapController getMapController()
Returns the MapController object for the layer.
Returns:
MapController

getPriority

public byte getPriority()
Returns the display priority of the object. Objects with higher priority are displayed on top of objects with lower priority.
Returns:
int the display priority of the object

setPriority

public void setPriority(byte priority)
Returns the priority of the object to receive system events. Objects with higher priority receive messages about user actions with the map first.
Parameters:
priority - the priority of the object to receive system events

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
Checks if the object is displayed on the screen.

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean visible)
Shows / hides the object.
Parameters:
visible - true - show the object on the screen, false - hide

getIRender

public IRender getIRender()
Returns the object responsible for rendering objects located on the layer.
Returns:
IRender the object responsible for rendering objects located on the layer

setIRender

public void setIRender(IRender iRender)
Sets the object responsible for rendering objects located on the layer.
Parameters:
iRender - the object responsible for rendering objects located on the layer

getOverlayItems

public java.util.List getOverlayItems()
Returns the list of objects located on the layer.
Returns:
List the list of objects located on the layer

addOverlayItem

public void addOverlayItem(OverlayItem item)
Adds an object (overlay item) to the layer.
Parameters:
item - the object to be added to the layer

removeOverlayItem

public void removeOverlayItem(OverlayItem item)
Deletes an object from the layer.
Parameters:
item - the object to be deleted from the layer

clearOverlayItems

public void clearOverlayItems()
Deletes all objects from the layer.

prepareDraw

public java.util.List prepareDraw()
Prepares the list of layer objects before rendering them on the layer. The method should be called by the app for each layer to prepare its elements for drawing.
Returns:
List

onTouchEvent

public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
Called when a touch event occurs on the layer.
Parameters:
MotionEvent - the motion event
Returns:
event true - the touch event occurred on the layer, false - otherwise

onSingleTapUp

public boolean onSingleTapUp(float x,
                             float y)
Called when the onSingleTapUp event occurs on the layer.
Parameters:
the - X coordinate of the point where the event has occurred
the - Y coordinate of the point where the event has occurred
Returns:
boolean true - the user has hit the OverlayItem object on the layer, false - otherwise

onScroll

public boolean onScroll(float distanceX,
                        float distanceY,
                        float x,
                        float y)
Called when the onScroll event occurs on the layer.
Parameters:
distanceX - the distance along the X axis that has been scrolled
distanceY - the distance along the Y axis that has been scrolled
x - the X coordinate of the point where the event has occurred
y - the Y coordinate of the point where the event has occurred
Returns:
always false by default

Parameters:
x - the X coordinate of the point where the event has occurred
y - the Y coordinate of the point where the event has occurred
Returns:
boolean true - the user has hit the OverlayItem object on the layer, false - otherwise
